        rows - horizontal dimension

      • loadRandomGrid

        public Cell[][] loadRandomGrid​(int dimensions)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        given a dimension (e.g. if dimensions = 3, then we're talking about 3x3)
        Parameters:
        dimensions - dimensions of the grid to load
        Returns:
        a Cell matrix by reading a random kakuro file in our custom kakuro file format of the specified dimensions
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if error while loading grid

      • loadGrid

        public Cell[][] loadGrid​(java.lang.String name)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         InvalidGridFileException
        given a path (name) returns the associated grid within the file if it respects our custom kakuro file format
        Parameters:
        name - path of file
        Returns:
        cell grid
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if error while reading file
        InvalidGridFileException - if invalid kakuro format
